babel-plugin-transform-es2015-modules-amd

This plugin transforms ES2015 modules to Asynchronous Module Definition (AMD).

Example

In

javascript export default 42;

Out

```javascript define([“exports”], function (exports) { “use strict”;

Object.defineProperty(exports, “__esModule”, { value: true });

exports.default = 42; }); ```

Installation

sh npm install --save-dev babel-plugin-transform-es2015-modules-amd

Usage

Via .babelrc (Recommended)

.babelrc

json { "plugins": ["transform-es2015-modules-amd"] }

Via CLI

sh babel --plugins transform-es2015-modules-amd script.js

Via Node API

javascript require("babel-core").transform("code", { plugins: ["transform-es2015-modules-amd"] });

Options

See options for babel-plugin-transform-es2015-commonjs.
